name: Kingdom of Loathing (KoL) – How Drunk Will I Get?
description:
Places a drunkenness indicator next to each booze item in your inventory.

June 24, 2010 – removed N. O. Beer, Otorian Battle Scar, calle de miel with a fly in it, rockin' wagon with a fly in it, perpendicular hula with a fly in it, slap and tickle with a fly in it, tangarita with a fly in it, mandarina colada with a fly in it, prussian cathouse with a fly in it, Mae West with a fly in it, and blended frozen swill with a fly in it; added Schrödinger's thermos, missing wine, world's most unappetizing beverage, plastic cup of beer, and Cinco Mayo Lager
April 19, 2010 – creation date
